meanings.definition: Presenting a keynote address at an event.
meanings.sent1: She will be keynoting the conference next week.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys keynoting various seminars throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: The robot insisted on keynoting the company picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her words keynoted the room, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: Keynoting the event, she set the tone for the entire conference.

meanings.definition: The act of delivering a keynote speech.
meanings.sent1: His keynoting was well-received by the audience.
meanings.sent2: Attending the keynoting was the highlight of the event.
meanings.sent3: The cat's keynoting at the party was unexpected but entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The keynoting echoed in the hall, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The keynoting left a lasting impact on the attendees.

meanings.definition: The main theme or central idea of a presentation.
meanings.sent1: The keynoting of the talk was about teamwork.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the keynoting of the lecture is crucial.
meanings.sent3: The keynoting of the play was humorously misunderstood by the audience.
meanings.sent4: The keynoting of the story resonated with the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The keynoting of the presentation was clear and concise.
